Plot: Vampires, Witches, and Venice!Ivan Lockhart cheated death for the last time. In seventeenth-century England, Ivan embarks on a trip to the Old World to run away from his sins. The pleasures of the luxurious Venetian lifestyle numb the guilt that Lockhart carries day by day. But not all is as it seems, and soon Ivan finds himself wrapped in the darkest mysteries of La Serenissima. Don't miss the beginning of this bestselling series! Magic, mystery, and monsters entwine in The Unnatural Brethren!
